QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct cast(ISNULL(cast(h.hospital_id as varchar), '') + ISNULL(cast(c.caresetting_id as varchar), '') as int) as care_site_id, h.hospital_id as care_site_source_value, census_division as location_id, c.caresetting_id as place_of_service_concept_id, caresetting_desc as place_of_service_source_value from {sc}.hf_d_hospital as h left join {sc}.hf_f_encounter as e on h.hospital_id = e.hospital_id left join {sc}.hf_d_caresetting as c on e.discharge_caresetting_id = c.caresetting_id
